content.theme: Every system has a weakness. You find it, exploit it, or build something better.
content.design: Systems augments provide hacking, support, and battlefield control through technology.

augments.name: Neural Jack
augments.effect: +2 to hacking and device interaction checks

augments.name: Remote Interface
augments.effect: Interact with devices at short range wirelessly

augments.name: Diagnostic Ping
augments.effect: 1/combat: identify all augments on one target

augments.name: Feedback Loop
augments.effect: When ally within short range crits, recover 1 HP

augments.name: ECM Burst
augments.effect: 1/combat: enemies in short range lose -1 accuracy for 1 round

augments.name: Overclock
augments.effect: 1/combat: grant ally +2 accuracy on their next attack

augments.name: Drone Uplink
augments.effect: Deploy scout drone. +2 Edge checks for perception/recon

augments.name: System Crash
augments.effect: 1/combat: disable one enemy augment for 2 rounds

augments.name: Auto-Repair Nanites
augments.effect: End of turn: heal 1 HP if below 50%

augments.name: Weapon Hijack
augments.effect: 1/combat: force one enemy to reroll their attack

augments.name: Network Tap
augments.effect: In hacking encounters: +3 to all Interface checks

augments.name: Killswitch
augments.effect: 1/mission: disable ALL augments on one target for entire combat

augments.name: Hard Reboot
augments.effect: Clear all effects on self. Lose all augment benefits for 1 round (trade-off)

augments.name: Battlefield Architect
augments.effect: 1/combat: hack the environment. Create cover, disable traps, lock doors, activate/deactivate systems
